projects.name: FlashChat
projects.description: Built a responsive real-time chat application with live message streaming capabilities that enables users to communicate instantly across different devices. The application features a modern, intuitive interface built with React.js and styled with Tailwind CSS for optimal user experience. Implemented WebSocket technology for seamless real-time communication, allowing messages to be delivered instantly without page refreshes. The backend is powered by Node.js and Express.js, providing robust server-side functionality and efficient message handling for multiple concurrent users.
projects.tech_stack: React.js, Tailwind CSS, WebSockets, Node.js, Express.js

projects.name: TypoMaster Web App
projects.description: A comprehensive real-time typing speed analyzer that meticulously tracks user input, calculates accuracy percentages, and measures words per minute using advanced Server-Sent Events (SSE) technology. This full-stack application provides instant feedback and detailed analytics to help users improve their typing skills through interactive practice sessions. The platform features a responsive design that works seamlessly across all devices, real-time progress tracking, and personalized performance insights. Built with the MERN stack, it stores user progress in MongoDB and delivers live updates through SSE, creating an engaging and educational typing experience for users of all skill levels.
projects.tech_stack: React.js, TailwindCSS, Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, SSE

projects.name: Sentiment Analysis App
projects.description: An advanced Natural Language Processing (NLP) application that intelligently analyzes and classifies user-submitted text as Positive, Negative, or Neutral using a carefully trained machine learning model. This sophisticated system processes text input through multiple preprocessing stages, including tokenization, feature extraction, and sentiment scoring to deliver accurate emotional tone analysis. The application combines the power of scikit-learn algorithms with NLTK's comprehensive language processing capabilities, providing users with instant sentiment insights. Deployed on Streamlit Cloud, it offers an intuitive web interface where users can input any text and receive immediate, reliable sentiment classification results with confidence scores.

projects.name: BlogSphere – Blogging Platform
projects.description: A full-featured, professional blogging platform that provides users with a complete content management system including secure user authentication, rich-text editing capabilities, and comprehensive CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations for blog posts. This robust web application features user registration and login functionality secured with JWT tokens and Bcrypt password hashing for maximum security. The platform includes an intuitive rich-text editor that allows bloggers to format their content with ease, supporting various text styles, images, and media embedding. Built with the MERN stack and styled with TailwindCSS, BlogSphere offers a modern, responsive design that ensures optimal user experience across all devices while providing scalable backend infrastructure for growing user bases.
